data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Tosu at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Throw-in for Cerezo close to the penalty box.
Can Cerezo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tosu's half?
In the minute 4, Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cerezo are whistled for offside.
Fuchi Honda is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 12, Tomoya Koyamatsu (Tosu) has replaced the possibly injured Fuchi Honda.
Goal kick for Tosu at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Throw-in for Tosu in the half of Cerezo.
In the minute 18, Tosu drives forward and Takeshi Kanamori gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Cerezo will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Tosu.
In the minute 22, Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Yuta Higuchi.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Shinya Nakano (Tosu) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 28, Cerezo are pushing forward but Naoyuki Fujita's finish is wide of the goal.
Tosu have a goal kick.
Throw-in Tosu.
In the minute 31, Hideto Takahashi of Tosu smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Tosu to take a throw-in in Cerezo territory.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Hideto Takahashi for Tosu who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 34, Hideto Takahashi, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Ryang Yong-Gi is the substitute for Tosu.
Yuta Toyokawa for Cerezo is whistled offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 37, Tosu are coming forward and Daiki Matsuoka gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Free kick for Tosu in the half of Cerezo.
Cerezo's Eiichi Katayama is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Yuta Toyokawa.
That's a fine assist from Hiroshi Kiyotake.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Yuta Higuchi (Tosu) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Tosu in the half of Cerezo.
Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
Cerezo to take a throw-in in Tosu territory.
In the minute 45, Cerezo pushes forward through Hiroshi Kiyotake, whose finish on goal is saved.
Cerezo drives forward and Naoyuki Fujita gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Tosu make their third substitution with Renzo Lopez replacing Takeshi Kanamori.
Yoichiro Kakitani is replacing Riku Matsuda for the home team.
In the minute 47, Can Cerezo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tosu's half?
Ball safe as Tosu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hiroaki Okuno of Cerezo gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 48, It's a goal kick for the away team in Osaka.
Tosu's Yuta Higuchi misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
In the minute 49, Toshiyuki Takagi is on a sub for Yuta Toyokawa for Cerezo.
Cerezo are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 54, Cerezo are pushing forward but Hiroshi Kiyotake's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Tosu at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 58, Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Tosu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Tosu at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Cerezo's Yoichiro Kakitani misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Osaka.
In the minute 65, Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Tosu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 67, Tosu have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Cerezo in their own half.
Tosu to take a throw-in in Cerezo territory.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Cerezo in the half of Tosu.
Can Tosu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
Ball safe as Tosu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 77, Throw-in Tosu.
In Osaka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
In the minute 81, Cerezo to take a throw-in in Tosu territory.
Hiroshi Kiyotake (Cerezo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Cerezo takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 88, The away team replace Daichi Hayashi with Tiago Alves.
Cerezo make their third substitution with Koji Suzuki replacing Tatsuhiro Sakamoto.
The home team replace Yusuke Maruhashi with Yuta Koike.
Koji Suzuki of Cerezo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tosu goal kick.
Free kick Cerezo.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Tiago Alves of Tosu gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
The match is over. Final score 1-2.
Renzo Lopez (Tosu) gets a yellow card.
Tosu take a 1-2 lead thanks to Tiago Alves.
